<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0ff6aad393c4130818fb4f49137380f78d7cc882|patch 8.2.0173: build fails with old compiler>
patch 8.2.0173: build fails with old compiler

Problem:    Build fails with old compiler.
Solution:   Do not use anonymous unions. (John Marriott)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0173: build fails with old compiler · vim/vim@0ff6aad
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0173: build fails with old compiler · vim/vim@0ff6aad
attachments.text: Problem: Build fails with old compiler. Solution: Do not use anonymous unions. (John Marriott)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/db661fb95dc41b7a9438cf3cd4e77f8410bc81c0|patch 8.2.0175: crash when removing list element in map()>
patch 8.2.0175: crash when removing list element in map()

Problem:    Crash when removing list element in map().
Solution:   Lock the list. (closes #2652)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0175: crash when removing list element in map() · vim/vim@db661fb
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0175: crash when removing list element in map() · vim/vim@db661fb
attachments.text: Problem: Crash when removing list element in map(). Solution: Lock the list. (closes #2652)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e258368b4fb22fe5fc9bf510ac303a3542ff8e83|patch 8.2.0176: generating os headers does not work for Swedish>
patch 8.2.0176: generating os headers does not work for Swedish

Problem:    Generating os headers does not work for Swedish.
Solution:   Set the locale to C. (Christian Brabandt, closes #5258)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0176: generating os headers does not work for Swedish · vim/vim@e258368
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0176: generating os headers does not work for Swedish · vim/vim@e258368
attachments.text: Problem: Generating os headers does not work for Swedish. Solution: Set the locale to C. (Christian Brabandt, closes #5258)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/70b3e706b40fc2c84c1f9f33fa64945a481df395|patch 8.2.0177: memory leak in get_tags()>
patch 8.2.0177: memory leak in get_tags()

Problem:    Memory leak in get_tags().
Solution:   Free matches when finding a pseudo-tag line. (Dominique Pelle,
            closes #5553)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0177: memory leak in get_tags() · vim/vim@70b3e70
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0177: memory leak in get_tags() · vim/vim@70b3e70
attachments.text: Problem: Memory leak in get_tags(). Solution: Free matches when finding a pseudo-tag line. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5553)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/df54382eacdbfa10291adb80ad6b89ad83bd7c9b|patch 8.2.0178: with VTP the screen may not be restored properly>
patch 8.2.0178: with VTP the screen may not be restored properly

Problem:    With VTP the screen may not be restored properly.
Solution:   Add another set of saved RGB values. (Nobuhiro Takasaki,
            closes #5548)
